mapper.insert: insert into member (u_email, u_pw, u_phone_number, u_nickname) values (#{u_email}, #{u_pw}, #{u_phone_number}, #{u_nickname})
mapper.update: update member set u_pw = #{u_pw}, u_phone_number = #{u_phone_number}, u_nickname = #{u_nickname}, u_is_admin = #{u_is_admin}, u_is_blocked = #{u_is_blocked} where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.select: UPDATE member SET u_expire_member = case when (now() > u_expire_member) then date_add(now(), interval +1 MONTH) ELSE NOW() end WHERE u_id = #{u_id}
SELECT u_id, u_email, u_nickname FROM member;
